name: roku-requests
description: BrightScript http framework for Roku apps, inspired by Pyton Requests

scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run validate
scripts.build: make-dir dist/source && concat -o dist/source/Requests.brs src/source/Requests.brs src/source/Cache.brs src/source/Headers.brs src/source/QueryString.brs src/source/Response.brs src/source/UrlTransfer.brs src/source/Utils.brs

author: Blake Visin
